## IHandleMessageArgs interface

Input arguments for [handleMessage](./core.imessagehandler.handlemessage.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IHandleMessageArgs
```

## Properties

| Property                                           | Type                                  | Description                                                                                                                                                |
| -------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [metaData?](./core.ihandlemessageargs.metadata.md) | [IMetaData](./core.imetadata.md) \[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional. Message meta data                                                                                                              |
